name: Dev.tv Game Jam 2022 - Title TBA
description:
Game is currently in development for the Gamedev.TV Game Jam! We hope to finish in time for submissions.

Game is controlled only by mouse. Still in early development. Left Click the "Main Menu" screen to jump inot the default level. Press escape to leave the default level to the "Game Over" menu. Left click again to return to the "Main Menu"

This game is open sourced, with a functioning CI/CD pipeline to automatcally build and deploy to itch.io. Feel free to watch this game evolve over time!
